text:
Hi guys,
how can I get and chat real time on my app as same as HubSpot app. For example: <https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1VrnyjcYTkhTADCH4B3eALwpr2Qm55Uzb>
Can you suggest way to resolved it for me, please?
Thank you
Hi <@U01C388A878> i suggest you to move your post in <#C019VT42R8X|workflows>
I mistrust that Conversations SDK just supports for website (Web) instead of app environment.

Hi everyone, I'd like to build a call & chat center app that agency can accept the customer's call & chat in HubSpot CRM.
As I know, similar apps like the Aircall and other apps are built by chrome extension.
Is there any other way to build this kind of app without using the chrome extension?

Hey guys .. I need help .
Can we download private files that were uploaded to the CRM using the API?
<@UTLS5CCNT> why using an api to download a file ? What is your project and the feature you need ?
<@U01DF3PNCKA> I have an automated script once a deal is closed, I need to upload those files to another system where the user there will be able to see those files.
Did you check the api documentation ?

<@UTLS5CCNT> in your import script you use to move file to your other system you have to use the api to :
• retrieve the file id
• get a download link on this endpoint : <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/files/get-signed-url-private-file>
• download it
Hey, if we are using the forms API to submit form data to HubSpot it looks like we have to include the UTM parameters in the payload, is that correct?

How do you use optional scope to get authorization URL in HubSpot nodejs library?

```const uri = HubSpotClient.oauth.getAuthorizationUrl(clientId, redirectUri, scope)```
